title:
Modeling of pattern formation of the ordered intermediate phases during
  co-deposition of binary thin film
abstract:
Formation of the intermediate phase patterns in the thin-film co-deposition
process is simulated using the Stochastic Kinetic Mean-Field method and Monte
Carlo. Three basic morphologies of the 2D sections are distinguished: (1) spots
(rod-like in 3D), (2) layered structures-lamellae, zigzags, and labyrinths
(plate-like in 3D), and (3) net-like structures (inverse to spot-like
structures, when spots become majority and the surrounding matrix becomes a
minority). They are characterized and distinguished with the help of only one
special topological parameter.
